metadata.title: Liftmaster/Chamberlain LA500DC Primary Replacement Arm for LA500PKGUL
description: Replace the primary arm on your LiftMaster LA500 Series gate operator with the LA500DC primary. This primary arm can be programmed for auto-close functions and leave-open operations. The LA500DC LiftMaster replacement primary gate operator arm includes 8 feet of wire. The LA500DC gate arm with a no-rust aluminum housing is rated for a gate that is up to18 feet long and weighs up to 1,200 pounds. You can also integrate it with MyQ technology on a MyQ smartphone app for off-site monitoring when used with a LiftMaster Internet Gateway. Product Highlights: Primary operator arm only, Do not use as secondary arm, No-rust aluminum housing, Rated for gates up to 8 ft. L, 1,200 lbs., Can integrate with MyQ apps with LiftMaster Internet Gateway, Includes 8 ft. wire.
